net.sf.gogui.gui
Interface GuiBoard.Listener

GoGui

GuiBoard
public static interface GuiBoard.Listener

Callback for clicks on a field.

Method Summary
 void contextMenu(GoPoint point, java.awt.Component invoker, int x, int y)
          Callback for context menu.
 void fieldClicked(GoPoint p, boolean modifiedSelect)
          Callback for click on a field.
 

Method Detail

fieldClicked

void fieldClicked(GoPoint p,
                  boolean modifiedSelect)
Callback for click on a field. This callback is triggered with mouse clicks or the enter key if the cursor is shown.

Parameters:
p - The point clicked.
modifiedSelect - Modified select. True if the click was a double click or with the right mouse button or if a modifier key (Ctrl, Alt, Meta) was pressed while clicking, as long as it was not a (platform-dependent) popup menu trigger.

contextMenu

void contextMenu(GoPoint point,
                 java.awt.Component invoker,
                 int x,
                 int y)
Callback for context menu. This callback is triggered with mouse clicks that trigger popup menus (platform-dependent).

Parameters:
point - The point clicked.
invoker - The awt.Component that was clicked on.
x - The x coordinate on the invoker component.
y - The y coordinate on the invoker component.
